testCaseName: Verify if a validation message is displayed when the user wants to reset the password
name: Verify if a validation message is displayed when the user wants to reset the password
description: This test case is to verify if a validation message is displayed when a user wants to reset his password

steps.name: Click on [Login] button in Presentation page

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Click on [Login] button in Presentation page

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Click on [Reset your Password] button in Login Modal

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Set on control: [Reset Password] textBox in Login Modal the value: [emailexample@gmail.com]

steps.name: Click on [Send] button for reset password in Login Modal

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Click on [Send] button for reset password in Login Modal

steps.name: Check the [Validation Message] label in Presentation Page is displayed: true
